name: Space Climber - Unity Source Code
description:
Test it here (WebGL)

Or download the test apk file and test it on your android device

Touch the screen to jump. Stack the blocks on top of each other and avoid crashing into them. Line up blocks perfectly at top of each other and you will get a bonus score. Once a block hits you the game is over. Try to score as much as you can.

It is very easy to setup AdMob ads, just follow these steps:

  • Go to Assets - > Google Mobile Ads -> Settings and put your app id (from your AdMob console) there.
  • Open the script "Menus.cs" and put you interstitial ad id on line 56 for android, line 58 for iOS.
